translations: n.生物过滤器；细菌过滤器

phrs.translation: 生物滤器, 生物滤池, 生物过滤塔
厌氧生物滤池, 厌氧滤池
活性生物滤池, 活性生物滤池处理系统
转鼓生物过滤器, 生物转鼓过滤器, 生物转鼓, 器
淹没式生物膜, 淹没式生物滤池

sentences.sentence: Applying the model to the experimental up-flow anaerobic biofilter.
sentences.translation: 将模型应用于实验上向流厌氧生物滤池。

sentences.sentence: Study was made on the efficiency and mechanism of shortcut nitrification-denitrification in aerated biofilter.
sentences.translation: 通过小试研究了曝气生物滤池实现短程硝化反硝化的效能和机理。

sentences.sentence: The length of alternate aeration influences phosphorus removal in the alternately aerated two-stage biofilter.
sentences.translation: 交替曝气时间是影响新型两级生物滤池工艺除磷效果的关键因素。
